citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 P.M. on
19-Oct-17.
Knocked on the house door, called the number provided and waited at the facility for thirty minutes.
